Broadway (right),at the N.W. corner of West 218th Street (left), showing the southeastern corner of Baker Field of Columbia University.

October 25, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

717830f-a.text:

715823f-a.text:
West 216th Street, north side, between Broadway and Seamen Ave. Building shown is a 3-story frame house.
